name: Juice Interactive
description:
Juice Interactive is a forward-thinking digital agency located in Chicago.  We have a unique and experienced team of strategists, developers, designers and producers whose focus is to provide strategic insight, holistic programs and seamless digital applications.  
Juice provides a wide range of services including digital and social strategy, user experience design, platform integration, custom CMS programs, application development, content marketing and development, hosting and support.
